content: May 8 (OPTA) - Championship fixtures for this week Monday, May 8 fixtures (BST/GMT) Birmingham City v Sheffield United (1500/1400) Burnley v Cardiff City (1500/1400) Huddersfield Town v Reading (1500/1400) Luton Town v Hull City (1500/1400) Middlesbrough v Coventry City (1500/1400) Millwall v Blackburn Rovers (1500/1400) Norwich City v Blackpool (1500/1400) Preston North End v Sunderland (1500/1400) Queens Park Rangers v Bristol City (1500/1400) Swansea City v West Bromwich Albion (1500/1400) Watford v Stoke City (1500/1400) Wigan Athletic v Rotherham United (1500/1400)
